nodes.text: Kolka Zteht was an artist who created a sandglass sculpture of Ziro the Hutt.

Kolka Zteht originated as a non-player character in the Legends Star Wars-themed MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. In the game, the artist was depicted as a female Rodian. Zteht entered the new Star Wars canon through a mention in Star Wars Adventures, Volume 1: Heroes of the Galaxy.
